data.title: 以至少 50 个字回答问题
data.content: "Some believe the government should invest in exploring outer space. Others argue that the government should use these resources for our basic needs on Earth. What do you believe? Why? Give specific reasons for your answer."
data.answer: Although some people believe that government should focus on our planet and invest money in researches that can help improve our beloved home, earth, I personally believe that government should allocate funds to explore outer space. There are two main reasons. One reason is that exploring outer space can help people develop technology that can help us improve our standard of living. Another reason is that there are many certainties in outer space and gaining a better understanding of it can help people stay alert and minimize our risks from outer space.
